q1.auction

Class MergeSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • q1.auction.MergeSort

  • public class MergeSort
extends java.lang.Object
    Merge sort class to sort arrays of ints, or arraylists of Bid objects. Array/ arraylist contents are sorted in ascending order. (Bids are sorted by bid amount).
    Version:
    07.3.2016
    Author:
    j. fitzgerald

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static Bid[] bidAux
      Temporary Bid array for sorting purposes
      (package private) static int[] intAux
      Temporary int array for sorting purposes

      MergeSort()
